title: Mocha Decadence Cake
ingredients: ['115g (4 oz) butter', '175g (6 oz) dark chocolate', '150g (5oz) caster sugar', '150g (5oz) finely ground walnuts', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '3 tablespoons Tia Maria', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', 'Glaze', '50g (2 oz) dark chocolate, melted', '2 tablespoons Tia Maria', 'icing sugar for dusting']
